Toolkit" cachelocation="false" url=" /soap/ajax/29.0/apex.js ">(function(skuid){
  var $ = skuid.$;
  $(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
    var myModel = skuid.model.getModel('MyModelId');
    var myComponent = skuid.component.getById('MyComponentUniqueId');
  });
})(skuid);</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="calcFinAmt" cachelocation="false">// Get reference to our Application model
var appModel = skuid.$M('AppEquipmentModel'); 
// Get reference to the first row
var appRow = appModel.getFirstRow();
try {
    var result = sforce.apex.execute(
        'genesis.SkuidPricingCtrl',
        'generatePricing', { 
            applicationId : appRow.genesis__Application__c 
        }
    );
    console.log(result); 
} catch (err) {
    console.log('Error getting pricing: ' + err.description);
} </jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="newSnippet" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
  closeTopLevelDialogAndRefresh({iframeIds: ['deal-dashboard-iframe,relationship-iframe']});</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="yearOfManufature" cachelocation="false">myElement.addClass('hide-datepicker-calendar').datepicker({
     changeMonth: true,
     changeYear: true,
     showButtonPanel: true,
     dateFormat: 'MM yy',
     onClose: function(dateText, inst) { 
         var month = $("#ui-datepicker-div .ui-datepicker-month :selected").val();
         var year = $("#ui-datepicker-div .ui-datepicker-year :selected").val();
         $(this).datepicker('setDate', new Date(year, month, 1));
     }
});</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="newSnippetRefresh" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
//window.location.reload();
parent.location.reload();</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="ValidateEquipment" cachelocation="false">var newAppParams = {};
var editorWrapper1 = $('div#Equipementheader'); 
var editor1 = editorWrapper1.data('object').editor;

var EquipmentModel = skuid.model.getModel('AppEquipmentModel');
var EquipmentRow = EquipmentModel.data[0];
var returnVal = true;

alert('EquipmentRow:' + EquipmentRow.Id);
//alert('seq:' + Psrow.genesis__Sequence__c);
//alert('total:' + paymentSchModel.data.length);
editor1.clearMessages();

if(EquipmentRow.genesis_Equipment_Description__c === null || EquipmentRow.genesis_Equipment_Description__c === '') 
{
   alert('Please enter description of Equipment.');
    editor1.handleMessages( 
        
        [{
           
            message: 'Please enter description of Equipment.', 
            severity: 'ERROR'
        }]
     
    );

   returnVal = false;
}

alert(returnVal); 
return returnVal;</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="CloseDialog" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;
closeTopLevelDialogAndRefresh({iframeIds: ['deal-dashboard-iframe,loan-details-iframe']});</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="RefreshPage" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

parent.location.reload();
//var EquipmentModel = skuid.model.getModel('AppEquipmentModel');
//var EquipmentRow = EquipmentModel.data[0];

//parent.location = '/'+EquipmentRow.genesis__Application__c; 
</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="showOnlyYear" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;
var pikVal = [];
var d = new Date();
var n = d.getFullYear();

    for(var a=1969;a<n;a++)
    {
        pikVal.push({label: a+1, value: a+1});
    }
    pikVal.reverse();
    return pikVal;</jsitem></javascript><css><cssitem location="staticresource" name="CLSNGUIComponent" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" content_type="application/zip"/><cssitem location="inline" name="layoutcss" cachelocation="false">
#partyDetailPageId {
    height: 848px;
}

body {
    background-color: #ebeef0;
}

body > .nx-page {
    padding: 0;
}

.image-button.money:after {
    content: 'Loan Opportunities';
}

.image-button.credit-analysis:after {
    content: 'Credit Analysis';
}

.image-button.financial-accounts:after {
    content: 'Financial Analysis';
}

.image-button.finInstitution:after {
    content: 'Financial Accounts';
}

.image-button.clockFire:after {
    content: 'Relationship Covenants';
}


</cssitem><cssitem location="staticresource" name="FontAwesomePack" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" content_type="application/zip"/><cssitem location="staticresource" name="CLSStyleSheetPack" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" content_type="application/zip"/><cssitem location="inline" name="datepicker" cachelocation="false">.hide-datepicker-calendar .ui.datepicker.calendar {
   display: none;
}</cssitem></css></resources><styles><styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/></styles><interactions/></skuidpage>

operator="="/></renderconditions></grid></components><resources><labels/><javascript><jsitem location="external" name="Apex AJAX Toolkit" cachelocation="false" url=" /soap/ajax/29.0/apex.js ">(function(skuid){
  var $ = skuid.$;
  $(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
    var myModel = skuid.model.getModel('MyModelId');
    var myComponent = skuid.component.getById('MyComponentUniqueId');
  });
})(skuid);</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="calcFinAmt" cachelocation="false">// Get reference to our Application model
var appModel = skuid.$M('AppEquipmentModel'); 
// Get reference to the first row
var appRow = appModel.getFirstRow();
try {
    var result = sforce.apex.execute(
        'genesis.SkuidPricingCtrl',
        'generatePricing', { 
            applicationId : appRow.genesis__Application__c 
        }
    );
    console.log(result); 
} catch (err) {
    console.log('Error getting pricing: ' + err.description);
} </jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="newSnippet" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
  closeTopLevelDialogAndRefresh({iframeIds: ['deal-dashboard-iframe,relationship-iframe']});</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="yearOfManufature" cachelocation="false">myElement.addClass('hide-datepicker-calendar').datepicker({
     changeMonth: true,
     changeYear: true,
     showButtonPanel: true,
     dateFormat: 'MM yy',
     onClose: function(dateText, inst) { 
         var month = $("#ui-datepicker-div .ui-datepicker-month :selected").val();
         var year = $("#ui-datepicker-div .ui-datepicker-year :selected").val();
         $(this).datepicker('setDate', new Date(year, month, 1));
     }
});</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="newSnippetRefresh" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
//window.location.reload();
parent.location.reload();</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="ValidateEquipment" cachelocation="false">var newAppParams = {};
var editorWrapper1 = $('div#Equipementheader'); 
var editor1 = editorWrapper1.data('object').editor;

var EquipmentModel = skuid.model.getModel('AppEquipmentModel');
var EquipmentRow = EquipmentModel.data[0];
var returnVal = true;

alert('EquipmentRow:' + EquipmentRow.Id);
//alert('seq:' + Psrow.genesis__Sequence__c);
//alert('total:' + paymentSchModel.data.length);
editor1.clearMessages();

if(EquipmentRow.genesis_Equipment_Description__c === null || EquipmentRow.genesis_Equipment_Description__c === '') 
{
   alert('Please enter description of Equipment.');
    editor1.handleMessages( 
        
        [{
           
            message: 'Please enter description of Equipment.', 
            severity: 'ERROR'
        }]
     
    );

   returnVal = false;
}

alert(returnVal); 
return returnVal;</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="CloseDialog" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;
closeTopLevelDialogAndRefresh({iframeIds: ['deal-dashboard-iframe,loan-details-iframe']});</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="RefreshPage" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var AppModel = skuid.model.getModel('AppEquipmentModel1');
//var appRow = AppModel.data[0];
//parent.location = '/'+appRow.Id; 
window.location.reload();

</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="showOnlyYear" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;
var pikVal = [];
var d = new Date();
var n = d.getFullYear();

    for(var a=1969;a<n;a++)
    {
        pikVal.push({label: a+1, value: a+1});
    }
    pikVal.reverse();
    return pikVal;</jsitem></javascript><css><cssitem location="staticresource" name="CLSNGUIComponent" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" content_type="application/zip"/><cssitem location="inline" name="layoutcss" cachelocation="false">
#partyDetailPageId {
    height: 848px;
}

body {
    background-color: #ebeef0;
}

body > .nx-page {
    padding: 0;
}

.image-button.money:after {
    content: 'Loan Opportunities';
}

.image-button.credit-analysis:after {
    content: 'Credit Analysis';
}

.image-button.financial-accounts:after {
    content: 'Financial Analysis';
}

.image-button.finInstitution:after {
    content: 'Financial Accounts';
}

.image-button.clockFire:after {
    content: 'Relationship Covenants';
}


</cssitem><cssitem location="staticresource" name="FontAwesomePack" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" content_type="application/zip"/><cssitem location="staticresource" name="CLSStyleSheetPack" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" content_type="application/zip"/><cssitem location="inline" name="datepicker" cachelocation="false">.hide-datepicker-calendar .ui.datepicker.calendar {
   display: none;

logictype="and"/></wrapper></components><resources><labels/><javascript><jsitem location="external" name="Apex AJAX Toolkit" cachelocation="false" url=" /soap/ajax/29.0/apex.js ">(function(skuid){

})(skuid);</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="calcFinAmt" cachelocation="false">// Get reference to our Application model
var appModel = skuid.$M('AppEquipmentModel'); 
// Get reference to the first row
var appRow = appModel.getFirstRow();
try {
    var result = sforce.apex.execute(
        'genesis.SkuidPricingCtrl',
        'generatePricing', { 
            applicationId : appRow.genesis__Application__c 
        }
    );
    console.log(result); 
} catch (err) {
    console.log('Error getting pricing: ' + err.description);
} </jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="newSnippet" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],

parent.location.reload();</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="LaunchEditEquipmentDialog" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;

var equipment = skuid.model.getModel('AppEquipmentModel');
var model = equipment.getFirstRow();
var equipmentId = model.Id;
// var partyName = model.clcommon__Account__r.Name;
var title = 'Edit ' + equipmentId;
var skuidPage = 'LeaseEquipment__details';
var iframeUrl = '/apex/skuid__ui?page=' + skuidPage + '&id=' + equipmentId;
alert(iframeUrl);
openTopLevelDialog({
    title: title,
    iframeUrl: iframeUrl
});</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="showOnlyYear" cachelocation="false" url="">var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;
var pikVal = [];
var d = new Date();
var n = d.getFullYear();

    for(var a=1969;a<n;a++)
    {
        pikVal.push({label: a+1, value: a+1});
    }
    pikVal.reverse();
    return pikVal;</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="refresh" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],

#partyDetailPageId {

}

}

.image-button.financial-accounts:after {

}

.image-button.finInstitution:after {
    content: 'Financial Accounts';
}

.image-button.clockFire:after {
    content: 'Relationship Covenants';
}

.wrapper-title .nx-pagetitle-maintitle {
    font: normal normal 700 14px Lato;
    padding-top: 10px;
    padding-bottom: 10px;
    padding-left: 10px;
